mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
loan_bank_card_send
( order_id, cardholder_name, cardholder_phone, cardholder_address, repay_card_num, express_send_address, express_send_num, express_send_date, gmt_create,gmt_modify )
VALUES
(#{item.orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
cardholder_name = VALUES(cardholder_name), cardholder_phone = VALUES(cardholder_phone), cardholder_address = VALUES(cardholder_address), repay_card_num = VALUES(repay_card_num), express_send_address = VALUES(express_send_address), express_send_num = VALUES(express_send_num), express_send_date = VALUES(express_send_date), gmt_modify = VALUES(gmt_modify)

insert into loan_bank_card_send (order_id, cardholder_name, cardholder_phone, cardholder_address, repay_card_num, express_send_address, express_send_num, express_send_date, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update loan_bank_card_send
cardholder_name = #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardholder_phone = #{cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardholder_address = #{cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repay_card_num = #{repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update loan_bank_card_send set cardholder_name = #{cardholderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardholder_phone = #{cardholderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardholder_address = #{cardholderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repay_card_num = #{repayCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_send_address = #{expressSendAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_send_num = #{expressSendNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, express_send_date = #{expressSendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
